message: For the coverage table, I'm thinking the columns should be Description, Matlab, scikits.image equivalent, Notes
the Notes might include tags pointing to other sources, :CellProfiler:, :Mahotas:, :OpenCV:
the Equivalent column could contain the :done:, :partial:, etc. tags
then one table should be enough for devs and users alike
That's just the first draft... feel free to highlight subtleties, things I should consider more carefully, more / fewer utility functions, etc.
